articles.title: Kim Yong Nam Greets Libyan Revolution Leader
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam Greets Libyan Revolution Leader
 Pyongyang, June 10 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK, Thursday sent a message of greetings to Moammer el Gaddafi, leader of the Revolution of the Great Socialist People's Libyan Arab Jamahiriya, on the occasion of the 40th anniversary of the dismantlement of the U.S. military base in Libya.
					 Kim in the message wished the Libyan people greater success in their efforts to defend the dignity and sovereignty of the country and achieve its progress and prosperity, expressing belief that the friendly and cooperative relations between the two countries would grow stronger.

articles.title: Russian PM Congratulates Choe Yong Rim
articles.content:
Russian PM Congratulates Choe Yong Rim
 Pyongyang, June 10 (KCNA) -- DPRK Premier Choe Yong Rim received a congratulatory message from Russian Prime Minister V. Putin on Wednesday.
					 Putin in the message extended congratulations to Choe Yong Rim upon his election as DPRK premier and assured him that the Russian side would continue boosting cooperation with the DPRK for the purpose of meeting the interests of the peoples of the two countries and ensuring peace and stability in Northeast Asia.

articles.title: Representatives of Foreign Companies Leave
articles.content:
Representatives of Foreign Companies Leave
 Pyongyang, June 10 (KCNA) -- Representatives of companies of China, Switzerland, Britain and India left here today after participating in the Pyongyang International Insurance Seminar.
					 They were seen off at the airport by Ko Su Gil, vice president of the Korea National Insurance Corporation.

articles.title: AINDF Members Visit Memorial Tower
articles.content:
AINDF Members Visit Memorial Tower
 Pyongyang, June 10 (KCNA) -- Jo Il Min, chief of the Pyongyang Mission of the Anti-Imperialist National Democratic Front, and its staff members visited the Three Charters for National Reunification Memorial Tower on Thursday on the occasion of the 10th anniversary of the publication of the historic June 15 joint declaration.
					 Being briefed on the fact that the tower, which was wonderfully built reflecting the will of all the Koreans to surely realize the desire for the reunification, conveys down to generations to come the exploits performed by the peerlessly great persons for the accomplishment of national reunification, they went round the tower, group sculptures of subsidiary theme, etc. 
					
					 Jo Il Min said:
					
					 The undying exploits performed by President Kim Il Sung for national reunification are always shining along with the history of the Korean nation.
					
					All the Koreans would accelerate the grand march for reunification upholding the June 15 joint declaration provided by General Secretary Kim Jong Il.
					
					 We will wage a more dynamic struggle to bring earlier the independent reunification of the country under the banner of "By our nation itself".

articles.title: DPRK Wins Gold in World Cup Women's Judo
articles.content:
DPRK Wins Gold in World Cup Women's Judo
 Pyongyang, June 10 (KCNA) -- An Kum Ae, DPRK female judoist grabbed a gold medal in the 52 kg category matches of the World Cup Women's Judo Tournament held in Romania.
					 She proved successful in different international games held in the past including the 29th Olympiad and the 15th Asian Games. 
					
					 Meanwhile, Kim Su Gyong bagged a silver medal in the 63 kg category matches.

articles.title: New Software Developed
articles.content:
New Software Developed
Pyongyang, June 10 (KCNA) -- The Samjiyon Information Center under the Korean Computer Centre has of late made new programs. 
					The e-learning system "Samjiyon" helps lecturers easily make educational programs suitable to SCORM Fourth.
					
					It also makes it possible for students to get education and evaluation in any time and place.
					
					"Unbangul", also called "Music Score Pro", notates and prints different musical scores, converts numerical and general scores to each other and plays chordal music. 
					
					Besides, the information centre has made effective programs necessary for business activities.

articles.title: Opera Performance Goes On in China
articles.content:
Opera Performance Goes On in China
 Pyongyang, June 10 (KCNA) -- Artistes of the Phibada Opera Troupe of the DPRK gave performances of opera "A Dream of Red Mansions" in Shenzhen City on June 6 and 7 amid the hot wind of this opera sweeping China.
					 The Baoli Theatre in the city, the venue of performance, was overcrowded with audiences, and they gave loud applause and unstinted praise to the Korean performers, fascinated by their beautiful tones of songs and graceful dances.
					
					 After appreciating the performance, the chairman of the Shenzhen City People's Political Consultative Conference said that he came to know well about the world-famous Korean art and such wonderful opera could be produced thanks to the Sino-DPRK friendship.
					
					 The director of the International Liaison Bureau of the Chinese Ministry of Culture said: A number of party and state leaders of China appreciated the performance of the opera when it was going on in Beijing. This made me know well about how deep the China-DPRK friendship is. The Korean artistes presented the genuine art to us.
					
					 The vice-director of the Guangdong Provincial Cultural Department said: The Korean artistes moved Chinese to tears through representation of the Chinese work. It is not easy to do so.

articles.title: US-S. Korea Accused of Their Reckless Campaign
articles.content:
US-S. Korea Accused of Their Reckless Campaign
 Pyongyang, June 10 (KCNA) -- The United States brought up the case of warship sinking, a sheer fabrication made by it together with the south Korean puppet group, for discussion at the UN Security Council in a desperate effort to prod it into slapping additional international sanctions against the DPRK. This was prompted by its ulterior intention to increase pressure including military sanctions upon the DPRK in a bid to stifle it. 
					 Rodong Sinmun Thursday observes this in a signed article. 
					
					 It goes on:
					
					 It is the true aim sought by the U.S. through its action to strain the inter-Korean relations to the worst phase with the above-said case as a momentum and thus ignite a new war in Korea. 
					
					 The U.S. move to groundlessly shift the blame for the sinking of warship "Cheonan" onto the DPRK is nothing but a very dangerous military adventure being pushed forward as part of the scenario to carry out its strategy for dominating not only Korea but also the rest of Asia and the world.
					
					 It is a very responsible and urgent task for ensuring peace on the Korean Peninsula and peace and security in the rest of Asia and the world to check and frustrate the moves of the U.S. imperialists to invade the DPRK. 
					
					  Handling the case of warship sinking from a selfish and biased stand would make it impossible to avoid the outbreak of a catastrophic war on the peninsula and, in that case, it would bring disastrous consequences to Asia and the rest of the world. 
					
					 It is the truth taught by history that unless a life-and-death struggle is waged against aggressors neither durable peace can settle on the peninsula nor can the Korean people live in peace, concludes the article.

articles.title: Anniversary of June Popular Resistance Observed
articles.content:
Anniversary of June Popular Resistance Observed 
 Pyongyang, June 10 (KCNA) -- Rodong Sinmun Thursday dedicates a signed article to the 23rd anniversary of the June Popular Resistance waged by the south Korean people against the United States' colonial domination over south Korea and the puppet forces' military fascist dictatorship. 
					 The article says:
					
					 The June Popular Resistance clearly proved that what tremendous power the popular masses can display when they turn out to accomplish a just cause and with no desperate efforts can aggressors and traitors overpower the united people. It taught a lesson that if the people are to finally realize their desire, they should not stop their struggle halfway but carry it on to the last. 
					
					 The resistance ended in the victory of the south Korean people but the military dictatorial rule was neither brought to an end nor the resistance fighters' desire for independence, democracy and reunification came true. 
					
					 The U.S., still keeping south Korea under its military occupation, is behaving like a master in the political, economic, cultural and all other fields of social life. It is violating the independent rights of the people, protecting a fascist dictatorial rule and desperately obstructing the Koreans' cause of national reunification. 
					
					 The group going under the mask of "pragmatists" is staying in power depending on outsiders like the successive dictators in south Korea, thus ruthlessly chilling the people's desire for independence, democracy and reunification, 
					
					 Traitor Lee Myung Bak cried out for "channeling all efforts into the economic recovery as elections were over". His remarks betrayed once again the arrogant and dictatorial nature of the group of traitors not accepting a stern judgment of the people at all. 
					
					 The group is going more reckless in its behavior, far from apologizing to the nation for such crime as faking up the case of warship sinking, thereby escalating the racket of confrontation and war than ever before.
					
					 The reality goes to prove that the south Korean people can never remain self-complacent with the results of the recent "elections to the local self-governing bodies" but should intensify the anti-"government" struggle till the conservative group is ousted from power.

articles.title: Meetings Marks Implement Decision of Chongryon Congress
articles.content:
Meetings Marks Implement Decision of Chongryon Congress
 Pyongyang, June 10 (KCNA) -- Meetings were held by headquarters of the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan (Chongryon) in different parts of Japan to implement the decision of its 22nd Congress. 
					 The 22nd meeting of the Tokyo Metropolitan Headquarters of Chongryon was held at the Korean Hall of Culture in Tokyo on June 6.
					
					 Present at the meeting were Ho Jong Man, chief vice-chairman of the Central Standing Committee of Chongryon, Kim Hong Chol, director of the General Affairs Department, and other deputies.
					
					 The meeting first heard a congratulatory message sent by the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK to the 22nd Congress of Chongryon.
					
					 Then followed a report and speeches. They stressed the need to make a breakthrough in national education and the work with the young Koreans and Korean workers in commerce in the future in order to usher in a new heyday of the patriotic movement.
					
					 Solidarity speeches were made by Japanese figures at the meeting. 
					
					 Ho Jong Man in his speech said that in order to keep pace with the compatriots in the homeland, sharing thinking and will with them in the stirring era in which a leap forward and miracles are brought about Chongryon should wage a dynamic "movement for inviting Koreans to come to the fold of Chongryon" and "a movement to gain a proper position of Koreans in Japan" for fresh progress of the Korean community in the new century.
					
					A letter to General Secretary Kim Jong Il was read out at the meeting.
					
					 On the same day, the 22nd meeting of the Osaka Prefectural Headquarters of Chongryon was held at the Korean Hall of Culture in Osaka.

articles.title: Cause of Korea's Reunification Supported in Guinea
articles.content:
Cause of Korea's Reunification Supported in Guinea
Pyongyang, June 10 (KCNA) -- Banou Keita, chairman of the Guinea-Korea Friendship Association, issued a statement on June 2 to mark the 10th anniversary of the June 15 North-South Joint Declaration.
					 Recalling that in June 2000 an inter-Korean summit was held in Pyongyang for the first time in 55 years after the division of the nation and the historic June 15 joint declaration made public, the statement described the declaration as a milestone for the unity and reunification of the Korean nation.
					
					 The reunification movement, which had made a dynamic progress along with the June 15 era of reunification, was confronted with a grave challenge in 2008 when the south Korean conservative forces came to power, it pointed out, and said:
					
					 As soon as it took office, the Lee Myung Bak group totally negated the June 15 joint declaration and the October 4 declaration and has persistently refused to implement them.
					
					 This put the inter-Korean relations, which were once favorably developing, at the crisis of total collapse and extreme confrontation.
					
					 The Lee group recently orchestrated the case of sinking of warship "Cheonan" to do harm to the DPRK and is driving the inter-Korean relations to the grave state of military confrontation.
					
					 The south Korean authorities should discontinue at once such acts of inventing clumsy conspiratorial farce as the "Cheonan" case, clearly mindful that development of the north-south relations and the national reunification can never be expected under the situation in which they are escalating the military tension while pursuing the hostile policy toward the DPRK.
					
					 The international community hopes that all the Koreans in the north and the south and overseas would promote reconciliation and cooperation and surely achieve the independent and peaceful reunification of the country under the banner of the June 15 joint declaration.

articles.title: Anniversary of Start of Work at WPK Observed
articles.content:
Anniversary of Start of Work at WPK Observed
Pyongyang, June 10 (KCNA) -- Lectures were held by the Juche Philosophy Study Committee of India and the Juche Idea Study Society of Indian Delhi and a film show by the Peruvian People's Women Union on June 1 and 2 to mark the 46th anniversary of General Secretary Kim Jong Il's start of work at the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea.
					 Wipin Gupta, chairman of the Juche Philosophy Study Committee of India, in a lecture said that Kim Jong Il clarified the will to steadfastly take the Juche idea, founded by President Kim Il Sung, as the guiding idea of the WPK and thoroughly embody it in the party building and activities at the time when he started his work at the C.C., the WPK.
					
					 The WPK led by Kim Jong Il will always demonstrate its might as an ever-victorious party, he added.
					
					 After watching Korean film "Pyongyang Today", Ruth Anchorena, general secretary of the Peruvian People's Women Union, said that the DPRK is a genuine flower garden of human love.
					
					 The general secretary further said:
					
					 The DPRK has put forward the children as "king" of the country and regards the universal free compulsory education as top priority of the state policies.
					
					 The women in the DPRK are the happiest women in the world as they are given special treatment at the state expense, enjoying all benefits at the Pyongyang Maternity Hospital.
					
					 The slogan "We Serve the People!" seen everywhere in Pyongyang can be found only in socialist Korea.
					
					 Korean-style socialism was provided by Kim Il Sung who founded the Juche idea and devoted his all to the country and the people.
					
					 The DPRK is confidently advancing toward the accomplishment of the revolutionary cause of Juche under the wise leadership of Kim Jong Il.

articles.title: Story of Kim Il Sung
articles.content:
Story of Kim Il Sung
 Pyongyang, June 10 (KCNA) -- One day in January, Juche 55 (1966) President Kim Il Sung visited a farm village situated on the outskirts of Pyongyang.
					 Going round the village in the intense cold of midwinter, the President acquainted himself with the farming preparations of the rural community. 
					
					 When he reached a valley with officials of the farm, he halted, hearing the low sound of flowing water emanant from a small fountain.
					
					 He told one of the officials to bring a shovel and pickax and dig the ice-crusted fountain.
					
					 As a narrow ditch came in sight, the President bent himself to see the stream. He then told the officials that the quantity of water was not little and that if the ditch was led to paddy fields throughout the winter, it would be enough for rice-transplantation.
					
					 The officials were deeply moved by the President always paying deep attention to farming. 
					
					Since then the narrow ditch has watered rice fields.

articles.title: Jo Il Min visita el monumento a 3 cartas de reunificacion
articles.content:
Jo Il Min visita el monumento a 3 cartas de reunificacion
Pyongyang, 10 de junio (ATCC) -- Con motivo del 10o aniversario de la publicacion de la historica Declaracion Conjunta del 15 de Junio, el representante Jo Il Min y otros miembros de la sucursal del Frente Democratico Nacional Antiimperialista en Pyongyang visitaron el jueves el Monumento a las Tres Cartas para la Reunificacion de la Patria.
					Los visitantes recorrieron el monumento, las esculturas del tema secundario y otros objetos escuchando explicaciones de que este monumento fue construido magnificamente gracias a la voluntad de todos los compatriotas de transmitir eternamente las imborrables hazanas de los grandes hombres sin pares en aras del cumplimiento de la causa de reunificacion de la patria y alcanzar sin falta esta meta.
					
					Al terminar la visita, Jo Il Min senalo que las imborrables proezas del Presidente Kim Il Sung acumuladas para el cumplimiento de la causa de reunificacion de la patria brillan eternamente con la historia nacional.
					
					Prosiguio que todos los compatriotas aceleraran la gran marcha de reunificacion acatando la citada declaracion preparada por el Dirigente Kim Jong Il.
					
					Lucharemos con mas vigor por adelantar la reunificacion independiente de la patria en acato al ideal de "Entre nosotros, los connacionales", concluyo.

articles.title: Personalidad guinea apoya Declaracion Conjunta del 15 de Junio
articles.content:
Personalidad guinea apoya Declaracion Conjunta del 15 de Junio
Pyongyang, 10 de junio (ATCC) -- El presidente de la Asociacion de Amistad Guinea-Corea, Banou Keita, hizo publica el dia 2 una declaracion dedicada al 10o aniversario de la publicacion de la Declaracion Conjunta Norte-Sur del 15 de Junio.
					  La nota se refiere a que en junio de 2000, tuvo lugar en Pyongyang el encuentro cumbre Norte-Sur por primera vez a los 55 anos de division nacional y se publico la historica Declaracion Conjunta del 15 de Junio, que resulta la hoja de ruta para la unidad y la reunificacion de la nacion coreana.
					
					  Senala que el movimiento por la reintegracion del pais, que avanzaba con dinamismo junto con la epoca de reunificacion iniciada el 15 de junio, tropezo en 2008 con el grave desafio debido a la llegada al poder de las fuerzas conservadoras surcoreanas.
					
					  Prosigue que tan pronto como asumiera el poder, la banda de Lee Myung Bak nego totalmente la declaracion arriba mencionada y la Declaracion del 4 de Octubre y se opuso persistentemente a la ejecucion de ellas, por lo cual las relaciones intercoreanas en desarrollo favorable cayeron en la crisis de ruptura total y confrontacion extremada.
					
					  Revela que la banda de Lee invento hace poco hasta el incidente de hundimiento de la corbeta "Cheonan" en contra de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y lleva asi las relaciones N-S a la grave tension militar.
					
					  Demanda a las autoridades surcoreanas que dejen de idear las farsas tan torpes como el incidente de naufragio de "Cheonan" teniendo bien presente que no se puede esperar el desarrollo de las relaciones intercoreanas ni la reunificacion del pais hostilizando a la RPDC y agravando la tension militar.
					
					  La sociedad internacional espera que toda la nacion coreana del Norte, el Sur y en ultramar promueva la reconciliacion y la cooperacion y alcance sin falta la reunificacion independiente y pacifica del pais bajo la bandera de la Declaracion Conjunta del 15 de Junio, concluye.

articles.title: An Kum Ae gana medalla de oro en la copa mundial
articles.content:
An Kum Ae gana medalla de oro en la copa mundial
Pyongyang, 10 de junio (ATCC) -- En el Torneo de Judo Femenino por la Copa Mundial efectuado en Rumania, la yudoca coreana An Kum Ae conquisto la medalla de oro en la categoria de 52 Kg. 
					Anteriormente, ella sobresalio en los eventos internacionales como los XXIX Juegos Olimpicos y los XV Juegos Asiaticos.
					
					  Por otra parte, Kim Su Gyong se llevo la presea de plata en la division de 63 Kg.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun ratifica rechazo a remision de caso "Cheonan" a ONU
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun ratifica rechazo a remision de caso "Cheonan" a ONU
Pyongyang, 10 de junio (ATCC) -- Estados Unidos esta desesperado para imponer la nueva sancion internacional contra la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea llevando al escenario de la ONU el caso de hundimiento de la corbeta surcoreana "Cheonan", inventado en confabulacion con los titeres surcoreanos.
					  Esto demuestra su intento de aplastar a la RPDC ejerciendo una presion intensiva incluyendo la sancion militar.
					
					  Asi senala el periodico Rodong Sinmun en un articulo individual del dia 10 y continua:
					
					  La meta verdadera de EE.UU. es provocar la nueva guerra en Corea agravando al maximo las relaciones entre el Norte y el Sur de Corea con motivo del citado caso.
					
					  La artimana de EE.UU. para imputar injustamente a la RPDC la responsabilidad del caso deviene una aventura militar muy peligrosa que se impulsa como parte de sus movimientos para realizar su estrategia hegemonica sobre toda Asia y el resto del mundo.
					
					  Frustrar las maniobras agresivas de EE.UU. a Corea deviene el problema muy responsable y apremiante para asegurar la paz de la Peninsula Coreana y la misma y la seguridad de Asia y el resto del mundo.
					
					  Si tratan el caso del "Cheonan" persiguiendo algun interes o en base a la parcialidad, no podran evitar el estallido de la guerra catastrofica en la Peninsula Coreana, la cual causara una consecuencia mortal a Asia y el resto del mundo.
					
					  La historia enseno la verdad de que sin entablar una pelea decisiva con los agresores, no se puede preservar jamas la paz duradera en la Peninsula Coreana  ni hacer vivir en sosiego al pueblo coreano.
